sum_bart: The letter was sent to the National Stock Exchange of India Limited (BSE) on April 16, 2015. The letter was filed under Regulation 30 of the SEBI ( Listing  Obligations and Disclosure Requirements)  2015 (Listing Regulations) The letter is titled: ‘Disclosure regarding the Order passed by the Office of Assistance Commissio ner (Estates) of Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation’
sum_peg: Dear Sir/Madam, we wish to inform you that the Office of Assistance Commissio ner (EJs), Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation, Mumbai has passed a penalty of  19,95,000/ - (Rupees Nineteen Lakhs Ninety) on the Company for violating theListing Obligations and Disclosure requirements of the Exchange.
sum_t5: SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (Listing Regulations) Regulations, 2015 (Listing Regulations)

sum_bart: IHCL increases its footprint with 100 new locations in FY 2025. 74 signings and 26 hotel openings will take place. Press release titled “ IHCL’s expansion plans” will be disseminated short ly.
sum_peg: Indian Hotels Company (IHCL), India’s largest hospitality company, increases its footprint with 74 new locations, with 26 hotel openings, taking its portfolio to 380 hotels.
sum_t5: India, we have also announced the launch of a new brand, Gateway, which will be a flagship brand of IHCL. This will be a flagship brand of IHCL, which will be a flagship brand of IHCL.
